game.name: Dramatour
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Full controller support, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: In this local split-screen multiplayer game, 2-4 players compete to build the tallest tower by stacking randomly selected 3D objects.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In this local split-screen multiplayer game, 2-4 players compete to build the tallest tower by stacking randomly selected 3D objects.
game.developers: Sophie Nadeau, Justin Bonin, Valérie Therrien, Léo Paquet Gauthier, Alexis David
